profile.name: Rafael Pereira
profile.title: Fullstack Developer
profile.bio1: I'm a fullstack developer with 5 years of experience at Dimensão Sistemas, where I've been collaborating on the development of an innovative web solution since the beginning of my career. At 22, I've already developed strong expertise in modern web technologies and a particular passion for frontend development.
profile.bio2: I specialize in building responsive and user-friendly applications using React, TypeScript, and Angular. I'm constantly exploring new technologies and approaches to create better user experiences and more efficient solutions.

description.0: I started my journey as an intern, where I had the opportunity to develop the company's institutional website
description.1: Currently, I work on the development and maintenance of the company's main app, implementing improvements and new features
description.2: I significantly contributed to the implementation of dark mode in the app, improving the user experience
description.3: I dedicate myself to problem-solving and optimizing application performance
description.4: I have the pleasure of sharing knowledge and mentoring two team colleagues in their professional development

ifsc.description: During the course, I had the opportunity to learn from basic to technical English, dove into programming logic using Java, explored fundamental algorithm concepts, and took my first steps in web development.

senac.degree: Technology Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
senac.description: During the course, I had a deep immersion in software development, learning C#, React, React Native, and Database. Beyond technical skills, I developed an entrepreneurial and innovative vision, understanding business rules and good development practices. The intensive and immersive study environment allowed me to grow both as a developer and as a professional.
